item.title: somanomaly: Self Organizing Map for Anomaly Detection
Anomaly detection on Cyber Physical System
item.description: This project tried to detect anomalies in real time using deep learning error dataset. I made a simple Python module in the linked repo (click the Code button under the title).

item.title: swatanomaly: Anomaly Detection using KL Divergence
Contextual Anomaly Detection by Correlated Probability Distributions using Kullback-Leibler Divergence
